text:
Hi all!
I have created some custom modules for email, Can anybody suggest how I can link the CSS file?
Here are the details/steps I have used:
1. Create a new email
2. Select drag & drop
3. select template(here I am not able to add the new HTML template)
4. Add the modules from custom modules
But How I can link the CSS?
Why you are not using inline css (with html tags) ??
I need to add media queries for mobile

Sorry little late, but thought itd be useful for anyone who searches for this question. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/files#scripting-based-on-field-values|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/files#scripting-based-on-field-values>
